attributes.action: Allow a Gender Recognition Certificate to trasfer a current Marriage License to a civil Partnership License
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently you have to first end your marriage before applying for a Civil Partnership, which not only takes up alot of time but also money. It would be alot easier if the Gender Recognition Certificate would automatically transfer the details from Marriage Certificate to a Civil one on presentation to the General Records Offices.
